au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.entities

Class Threat

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.GameObject
      • au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.entities.Threat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RockFall

    public class Threat
extends GameObject
    Threat is a gameobject that collides with the player, It also moves across the screen at a constant rate.
    Author:
    Steven
